name: Amiel Malay
text: Oh okay, I get it. (googled the phrase above).   Try this instead: do an "FB Like" with your right fist. Thumb shows where you want the cap/screw/nut to go, fingers show what direction to turn.    My dad called it the "right hand rule" long ago.

source_obj.text: Oh okay, I get it. (googled the phrase above).   Try this instead: do an "FB Like" with your right fist. Thumb shows where you want the cap/screw/nut to go, fingers show what direction to turn.    My dad called it the "right hand rule" long ago.

replies.text: No that's worse, then I have to look at my hand every time  :p
Depends on learning style. Mine's visual, so it's easier for me. I might have problems remembering the short alliteration mentioned above.
si sir manubay(?) din right hand rule di ba?:)))
Yeah, it's well-known sa physics and electronics
